messages.subject: Politico Question
messages.msgSnippet: A friend of mine asked me to pass along this message to unschoolers. I hope I don t overstep boundaries here...  but it is in direct relation to unschooling.
messages.messageBody:
A friend of mine asked me to pass along this message to unschoolers.
I hope I don't overstep boundaries here... but it is in direct
relation to unschooling.

Thanks.

********************

Hey all!

I've join Politico and submitted a question for all the Republican
candidates.

Please go here and vote for it:
http://dyn.politico.com/debate/republicans/VoteForQuestion.cfm#

Here is my question:

As an unschooling mother, parental rights in regards to education is
paramount. The National Education Association, which is adamantly
against homeschooling in any form, is pushing for a national
curriculum which would infringe on our freedom to allow our child to
learn in the ways that are best for him. Do you support a national
curriculum or the NEA's assessment of homeschooling?

*********************

Last I checked the question is currently #249 under the "topics" button.

Thanks.
